effect_entries.effect: Locks the user into this move.  Due to a bug, if this move misses, its accuracy drops to 1/256 as long as the user is still locked in.
Inflicts regular damage.  Every time the user is hit after it uses this move but before its next action, its Attack raises by one stage.
effect_entries.short_effect: If the user is hit after using this move, its Attack rises by one stage.

flavor_text_entries.black-2-white-2:
As long as this move is in use, the power
of rage raises the Attack stat each
time the user is hit in battle.
